lead_paragraph: Peter Som started his show this morning with a strong white story, before diving into the play of bright colors, kitty prints and flouncy ruffles for which he is known. The designer offered several options for winter whites, starting with the first look, a slim white skirt with sheer panels paired with a short white double-face jacket with broad rounded shoulders and a tightly belted waist. The linebacker-shoulder look was repeated throughout the collection on wrap coats and jackets.
